turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about J. Fred Zimmerman Jr..
turn.1: Who is J. Fred Zimmerman Jr.?
turn.2: J. Fred Zimmerman Jr.  John Frederick Zimmerman Jr. (27 August 1871 – 1948) was an American theater manager and stage producer.
turn.4: John Frederick Zimmerman was born on 27 August 1871, son of J. Fred Zimmerman, Sr. (1843–1925) and Emma A Wetherell.
turn.6: His father was a Philadelphia-based theater magnate, known for his role in the Theatrical Syndicate.
turn.7: What did he do in the family business?
turn.8: J. Fred Jr. became manager of the Chestnut Street Theater in Philadelphia, and later managed vaudeville theaters and cinemas.
turn.10: Zimmerman married the actress Ethel Jackson in 1902 at St. James Episcopal Church in Philadelphia.
turn.12: On August 3, 1908 Jackson obtained an interlocutory decree for a divorce without a co-respondent being named.
